mapper.sql: id, parent_id, menu_code, menu_name, menu_order, permission_key, target, description, show_style, create_time, modify_time, app_id
mapper.insert: insert into app_menu (parent_id, menu_code, menu_name, menu_order, permission_key, target, description, show_style, create_time, modify_time, app_id ) values ( #{parentId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{menuCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{menuName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{menuOrder,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{permissionKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{target,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{showStyle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, now(), now(), #{appId,jdbcType=BIGINT} )
mapper.update: update app_menu set parent_id = #{parentId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, menu_code = #{menuCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, menu_name = #{menuName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, menu_order = #{menuOrder,jdbcType=INTEGER}, permission_key = #{permissionKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, target = #{target,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, description = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, show_style = #{showStyle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=DATE}, modify_time = #{modifyTime,jdbcType=DATE}, app_id = #{appId,jdbcType=BIGINT} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
